finishing fix safety eyes in place above the purl stitches that you made in row 28 © 2021 hazel wadeson for nuthanger knits 5 join back seam of toy starting at the top of the hat and using mattress stitch throughout safety pin style stitch markers can be useful for keeping the different sections of the toy aligned as you sew i use the appropriate coloured yarn ends to seam each section as each section is finished i knot the yarn ends for that section and pop them inside the toy as part of the stuffing stuff the toy once the back seam is complete but before sewing up the horizontal seam at the bottom of the toy use enough stuffing so that the toy is firm but still with some give it shouldn t be completely solid the two yarns ends that match the bottom part of the toy will be in the centre of the bottom seam use each end to complete half of this seam each working from the centre of the seam outwards © 2021 hazel wadeson for nuthanger knits 6 circular knitting method cast on and set-up row using colour for lower body cast on 16sts i use the alternate cable cast on but feel free to use the cast on of your choice try to leave an end of 15-20cm 6-8 inches for sewing up the
